S

Steganographer - Class in threads
This class represents a practice implementation of a steganographer using threads.
Steganographer(String[]) - Constructor for class threads.Steganographer
This is the standard constructor of the Steganographer class, it checks whether the number of passed arguments is correct, then it prepares the picture for edits.
StScanner - Class in threads
This class scans the folder tree from the start folder and performs a mass encoding or decoding function, depending on the option chosen.
StScanner(String[]) - Constructor for class threads.StScanner
Standard constructor of StScanner, checks if there are enough arguments to function.
